thread.title: BRIEF-Coffee Holding Joint Venture Acquires Steep N Brew Coffee Company

title: BRIEF-Coffee Holding Joint Venture Acquires Steep N Brew Coffee Company

organizations.name: brief-coffee holding joint venture acquires steep n brew coffee company
brew coffee company reuters staff    coffee holding co inc

text:
Coffee Holding Co Inc:
* COFFEE HOLDING JOINT VENTURE ACQUIRES STEEP N BREW COFFEE COMPANY
* COFFEE HOLDING - PURCHASE PRICE UNDER DEAL COMPRISED CASH PAYMENT OF $1.6 MILLION, CASH PAYMENT OF $1.1 MILLION FOR PAYMENT FOR INVENTORY PURCHASED IN DEAL
* COFFEE HOLDING CO INC - PURCHASE PRICE UNDER ASSET PURCHASE AGREEMENT ALSO COMPRISED OF ISSUANCE OF PROMISSORY NOTE OF $150,000
* COFFEE HOLDING CO INC - GENERATIONS INTENDS TO INCORPORATE INFRASTRUCTURE OF STEEP N BREW INTO EXISTING BUSINESS MODEL OF GENERATIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
